typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesID as double,
		Amounts as double,
		Quantity as double,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		Product as string,
		{Discount Band} as string,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Manufacturing Price} as double,
		{Sale Price} as double,
		{Gross Sales} as double,
		Discounts as double,
		{ Sales} as double,
		COGS as double,
		Profit as double,
		Date as date,
		{Month Number} as double,
		{Month Name} as string,
		Year as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'SampleData',
	fileName: 'FinancialSample.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sheet1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		Product as string,
		{Discount Band} as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{Manufacturing Price} as string,
		{Sale Price} as string,
		{Gross Sales} as string,
		Discounts as string,
		{ Sales} as string,
		COGS as string,
		Profit as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{Month Name} as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
